attributes.action: Abolish All Prescription Charges Throughout the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wales has free prescriptions; Scotland (at the time of writing) has reduced prescription charges and plans to abolish them by 2011 with 90% already given for free; England is faced with higher and higher charges year upon year. Why should ill patients who live a mile from the Welsh or Scottish border be forced to pay while their neighbours enjoy free or soon-to-be-free prescriptions? Why should England be forced to subsidise costs? Free for all, or free for none.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
